snippet: The Dow industrials and Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index rose on comments by the Federal Reserve chairwoman, but Nasdaq moved lower.
abstract: Soothing words from Federal Reserve chairwoman Janet L Yellen help stock market move mostly higher, but Internet companies and Whole Foods Market fall sharply, taking the Nasdaq down.
lead_paragraph: The Dow industrials and Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index rose on comments by the Federal Reserve chairwoman, but Nasdaq moved lower.

headline.main: Investors Reassured by Fed, but Wary of Tech Sector
headline.print_headline: Investors Reassured by Fed, but Wary of Tech Sector
